DOC.brief_title: Comparison Telemedicine Versus Traditional Practice University Health Center
DOC.detailed_description: This study open student Arizona State University require follow-up care visit ASU Health Services . Patients see Mayo Clinic physician work ASU Health Services randomize either see followup health center physician see health center physician Mayo clinic utilize telemedicine . After visit , patient physician fill patient satisfaction survey record review independent investigator determine quality care review record .
